revision.text:
{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Sapphire (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Sapphire |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage by 15% for every enemy in battle (max. 200%) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Sapphire |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage by 16% for every enemy in battle (max. 200%) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Sapphire |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Boosts damage by 17% for every enemy in battle (max. 200%) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Sapphires''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Scale Mask |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from behind by 25%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 24,700 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Scale Mask |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from behind by 27%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 24,700 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Scale Mask |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from behind by 29%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 24,700 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Scale Masks''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox item |name = Scholar Necklace |image = File:XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Increases Class aptitude. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1520 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Scholar Necklaces''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]]

[[file:HarbringerCavill.jpg|thumb|Harbringer Cavill]] '''Scorpoxes''' are a family of enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}, first appearing in {{XC2}}. They are scorpion-like creatures very similar to [[Crustip]]s, and are mostly yellow, although one gray variety can be found in [[Spirit Crucible Elpys]].
== {{XC2|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Armor Scorpox]] * [[Lun Scorpox (XC2)|Lun Scorpox]] * [[Sinon Scorpox]]
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemy === * [[Scheele Scorpox]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Awarth Scorpox]] * [[Caliber Scorpox]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Harbinger Cavill]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Lun Scorpox (XC3)|Lun Scorpox]] * [[Randakk Scorpox]] * [[Uor Scorpox]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Dannagh Scorpox]] (During ''[[Scant Supplies]]'') * [[Drifter Scorpox]] (During ''[[Unwavering Resolve]]'') * [[Hedred Scorpox]] (During ''[[Beyond Mercy and Revenge]]'') * [[Ribeega Scorpox]] (During ''Beyond Mercy and Revenge'')
=== Unique Monster === * [[Stoneclipper Gorse]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Lun Scorpox (XC3)|Lun Scorpox]]
{{clr}} == Gallery == === {{XC2|-}} === <gallery> LunScorpox.jpg|Lun Scorpox 1ScheeleScorpox.png|Scheele Scorpox </gallery>
=== {{TTGC|-}} === <gallery> AwarthScorpox.jpg|Awarth Scorpox </gallery>
=== {{XC3|-}} === <gallery> XC3 Dannagh Scorpox.png|Dannagh Scorpox LunScorpexXC3.jpg|Lun Scorpox XC3 Ribeega Scorpox.png|Ribeega Scorpox XC3 Stoneclipper Gorse.png|Stoneclipper Gorse </gallery>

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox item |name = Scourwind Necklace |image = |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 40% when HP is at 30% or lower. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = [[Prize X-change Blue]] |sell = [[Gold|G]] }} '''Scourwind Necklaces''' are DLC [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. It can be purchased from [[Prize X-change Blue]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] for 6000 [[Noponstone]]s. {{clr}} {..."
